This is an interactive story involving giant woman/shrunken men and women, diapers, adult baby themes, and various forms of bondage and discipline. So I shouldn’t have to go to much into detail that this isn’t for EVERYONE. However, if this sort of thing tickles your fancy, then please submit an entry today... under these guidelines of course.

Here are the rules.

1.) All entries must be at least a paragraph long. There are exceptions like taking an opportunity to split a point in the story down to two or three options. But please keep that to a minimum.

2.) All giants in the story must be female ONLY. This means your cousin Vinny can’t join in and bounce you in his hairy knee... I mean it guys. I cannot stress this enough. An extra male can join in, only if he is to be shrunk down immediately afterwards.

3.) No shrinking bellow 1.5 feet tall. The main character in this story... you... must stay baby sized, compared to your giantess captor. There’s a little wiggle room between 2.5 and 1.5, but let’s not get too crazy.

4.) No growing giantess above 20feet tall. Same principle for Rule 3 applies here as well. Try to keep your size around an infants size in comparison to the giantess.

5.) No equal size ABDL play. What I mean by this is, the female mother figure cannot be the same size as your character. There are plenty of other interactive that offer that kind of thing, and I don’t want that here.

6.) No death.Why you might want that here, I’m not sure. Just don’t.

7.) No age regression. Please do not reduce the age of your character below 18. Thanks!

8.) Have fun!

Any entry that deviates from these guidelines will be removed. Other than that, I hope you guys have fun with this one!
